content: {"name": "SALVATION ARMY PERTH AMBOY", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please check social media for additional food/meal distribution events", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/NJSAPerthAmboy/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "433 State St.", "address_2": "", "city": "Perth Amboy", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08861", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.513454, "longitude": -74.265846}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 826-7040", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
